entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening and ending before morning. Clearing before morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022
